New Records: Anthony Edwards scored a career-high 53 points
Anthony Edwards made a personal-best 10 three-pointers
Key Match Events: Cade Cunningham led Detroit with 40 points
Malik Beasley added 23 points off the Pistons' bench
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pistons led by as much as 24 points in the contest
Others: Minnesota has now lost its last three games and six of its previous 10 to drop its record to 17-17 on the season
The Timberwolves host the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday
